author: stefanbratanov
content: I noticed we have https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/main/src/engine/amsterdam.md#executionpayloadv4 with blockAccessList, I suppose we just send null for epbs

author: nflaig
content: it seems like the geth image `epbs-devnet-0` is happy with just passing the slot number

author: nflaig
content:
make it two clients
```yaml
participants:
  - el_type: geth
    el_image: ethpandaops/geth:epbs-devnet-0
    cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lighthouse:epbs-devnet-0
    count: 2
  - el_type: geth
    el_image: ethpandaops/geth:epbs-devnet-0
    cl_type: lodestar
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lodestar:epbs-devnet-0
    count: 2

network_params:
  gloas_fork_epoch: 1

additional_services:
  - dora
```
